mapper.select: SELECT USER_NM, PROFILE_PIC, EH.EVENT_NM AS EVENT_NM, REVIEW_DESC AS REVIEW_DESC FROM REVIEW_INFOS RV , USER_INFOS UI , EVENT_HIST EH WHERE EH.PART_STATUS = 'COM' AND RV.EVENT_SEQ = EH.EVENT_SEQ AND EH.USER_ID = RV.USER_ID AND RV.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID ORDER BY RV.REVIEW_SEQ DESC
SELECT REVIEW_SEQ, RV.USER_ID USER_ID,US.USER_NM USER_NM,PROFILE_PIC, REVIEW_NAME, REVIEW_DESC ,STARS FROM REVIEW_INFOS RV , USER_INFOS US WHERE RV.EVENT_SEQ= #{ eventSeq } AND RV.USER_ID=US.USER_ID
